summary: Janardhan Jakhar chases his dreams of becoming a big Rock star, during which he falls in love with Heer.
cast: Ranbir Kapoor|Nargis Fakhri|Shammi Kapoor|Kumud Mishra|Piyush Mishra|Shernaz Patel|Aditi Rao Hydari|Sanjana Sanghi|Shikha Jain|Jaideep Ahlawat|Moufid Aziz|Geetika Budhiraja|Aakash Dahiya|Sushil Dahiya|Ranveer Kashyap|Teddy Maurya|Ram Menon|Rajinder Sharma Nanu|Shreya Narayan|Mohit Rastogi|Paritosh Sand|Sharad Sharma|Narendra Singh|Aru Krishansh Verma|Mária Zajacová-Ferencová
title: Rockstar
